Method Detail

check

public static StatusMessage check(java.lang.String CurrToken,
                                  java.lang.String PrevToken)
check whether 2 token are in the same Continuous Token sequence

Parameters:
CurrToken - the current token to check
PrevToken - the previous token in the sequence
Returns:
StatusMessage:
  • if the CurrToken and PrevToken are in the same sequence
    return: StatusMessage(true,"Check: Token is correct")
  • if the CurrToken and PrevToken are equal
    return: StatusMessage(true,"Check: found duplicate Token")
  • if the CurrToken and PrevToken are not in the same sequence
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Token is incorrect")
  • if the Token contains non alphanumeric ASCII (in ASCIITable)
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Token contains non alphanumeric ASCII")
  • if the CurrToken and PrevToken have different length
    return: StatusMessage(false,"Check: Token length is not match")
    See Also:
    StatusMessage, ASCIITable
